text: This list is of the Cultural Properties of Japan designated in the category of for the Prefecture of Mie. ==National Cultural Properties== As of 1 March 2015, eighteen Important Cultural Properties have been designated, being of national significance. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- !width="25%" align="left" | Property !width="5%" align="left" data-sort-
